Update navigation, profile photo, and styling

- Add black tab styling to navigation bar

- Update hero profile photo to new photoshoot image
- Reduce contact page header margins
- Add documentation files \(CHANGELOG, TODO, REVIEWS-RESEARCH\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
